name: unbalanced (DiscoTorso)
description:
This is a submission to the BlackThornProd Game Jam #1with the theme 'game development'.

With each stage you will find more options to balance your game experience. Maybe you're seeking a tough challenge. Maybe you're going for the highest possible score. I just like to chase super fast enemies.

Programming and art by DiscoTorso

Music by digital_failure

Some sounds from Gancher & Ruin Evil Machines Sample Pack

Uses https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/4720/draw-sprite-pos-fixed
to fix a poor GameMaker sprite function
